casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Tennyson, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Tennyson (1998), 84 Ohio St.3d 49.]

(No. 98-1127 Submitted October 13, 1998 Decided December 2, 1998.) Jonathan P. Dameron, for appellant.

*50The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Cook (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 404, 700 N.E.2d 570.

The court of appeals is directed to lift the stay of execution of sentence.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
